name: h4bff
description: End-to-end framework and inversion of control container for building modular web apps based on Plug-In architecture.
author: Andrej T.

scripts.watch: wsrun --stages -r --done-criteria='Watches established|Watching for file changes' watch
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs-dist && mkdir -p docs-dist/2-API && cp -r docs/* docs-dist/ && wsrun -p @h4bff/backend @h4bff/core @h4bff/frontend -c api-extractor run --local && cp packages/*/docs-json/*.api.json docs-dist/2-API && generate-ts-docs markdown -i docs-dist/2-API -o docs-dist/2-API && docsify-init -d docs-dist -e docs && docsify-auto-sidebar -d docs-dist && rm -rf packages/*/docs-json/*.api.json
scripts.docs-new: rimraf docs-dist && mkdirp docs-dist/2-API && copyfiles docs/**/* docs-dist/ && wsrun -p @h4bff/backend @h4bff/core @h4bff/frontend -c api-extractor run --local && copyfiles -f packages/**/docs-json/*.api.json docs-dist/2-API && generate-ts-docs markdown -i docs-dist/2-API -o docs-dist/2-API && docsify-init -d docs-dist -e docs && docsify-auto-sidebar -d docs-dist && rimraf packages/*/docs-json/*.api.json
scripts.docs-new-cpy-test: rimraf docs-dist && mkdirp docs-dist/2-API && cpy --parents --cwd=docs ** ../docs-dist && wsrun -p @h4bff/backend @h4bff/core @h4bff/frontend -c api-extractor run --local && cpy packages/**/docs-json/*.api.json docs-dist/2-API && generate-ts-docs markdown -i docs-dist/2-API -o docs-dist/2-API && docsify-init -d docs-dist -e docs && docsify-auto-sidebar -d docs-dist && rimraf packages/*/docs-json/*.api.json
